attributes.additional_details:
You WON'T be tested for the breast cancer gene unless someone in your family, who has suffered, has been tested. If, like myself, those family members have passed away then you will be fighting a loosing battle too!

If you want the government to change the way this system works then please sign this petition.

**WE SHOULD HAVE THE CHOICE TO BE ABLE TO SAVE OUR OWN LIVES**
